Description: Rest on the Flight to Egypt. The Virgin Mary seated with the Infant Christ in her lap to the left, St John as a child kissing the Infant Christ to the right, St Joseph in the background to the right; in an octagon shape Etching
Curator's comments: Although this print does not bear the artist's name, it was probably made by Jan Miel for stylistic reasons. For the pendant of this impression, see 1870.0709.203. For other impressions see 1870,0709.204 and F,1.90.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (2)
Weigel 1843 / Suppléments au Peintre-Graveur de Adam Bartsch (44.11)
Associated names: Representation of: St John the Baptist (Prodromos)
Acquisition notes: For the history of the acquisition of the Sheepshanks collection, please see Sheepshanks.1
